body_html:
@soumith Thanks for the update. It looks promising.

Two questions:
How is the performance difference between jit version of (script written) LSTM and GRU and the native implementation of LSTM and GRU, especially in the cases that pack_padded_sequence is involved?

Can pack_padded_sequence with with jit version of customized RNN cell?

body:
@soumith Thanks for the update. It looks promising. 

Two questions:
How is the performance difference between jit version of (script written) LSTM and GRU and the native implementation of LSTM and GRU, especially in the cases that pack_padded_sequence is involved? 

Can pack_padded_sequence with with jit version of customized RNN cell?
